scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docker:build: docker build --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t 32_scripting_aws .
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -it --volume /Users/${USER}/.aws:/root/.aws --env AWS_PROFILE=${AWS_PROFILE} --env AWS_REGION=${AWS_REGION}  --name 32_scripting_aws 32_scripting_aws
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker build --no-cache --target PRODUCTION -f Dockerfile --label "org.opencontainers.image.created=$(date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ')" --label "org.opencontainers.image.version=${githubsha}" --label "org.opencontainers.image.url=$(git remote get-url origin)" -t 32_scripting_aws .
